name: @dorbash2/akamai-edgegrid
description: Authentication handler for the Akamai OPEN EdgeGrid Authentication scheme in Node.js

scripts.ci: EDGEGRID_ENV=test MOCHA_FILE=./test/tests.xml nyc --reporter cobertura --report-dir test/coverage/ ./node_modules/.bin/mocha --reporter mocha-junit-reporter --reporter-options jenkinsMode=true --reporter-options antMode=true $(find test -name '*.js')
